lead_paragraph: The Devils signed the free-agent defenseman Anssi Salmela of Finland. Contract terms were not immediately available. The 23-year-old Salmela had 16 goals and 16 assists in 56 games with Tappara of the Finnish League last season. His 16 goals were the most for a defenseman in the league.
